text: The prime minister of Nepal is the chief executive and head of the government of Nepal. This is a list of prime ministers in Nepal *Vamsharaj Pande (1776-1785) *Abhiman Singh Basnet (1785-1794) *Kirtiman Singh Basnyat (1794-1801) *Bakhtawar Singh Basnyat (1801-1803) *Damodar Pande (1803-1804) *Rana Bahadur Shah (1804-1806) *Bhimsen Thapa (1806-1837) *Rana Jang Pande (1837) *Ranga Nath Poudyal (1837-1838) *Chautariya Puskhar Shah (1838-1839) *Rana Jang Pande (1839-1840) *Ranga Nath Poudyal (1840) *Fateh Jung Shah (1840-1843) *Mathabar Singh Thapa (1843-1845) *Fateh Jung Shah (1845-1846) *Jung Bahadur Rana (1846-1856) *Bam Bahadur Kunwar (1856-1857) *Jung Bahadur Rana (1857-1877) *Ranodip Singh Kunwar (1877-1885) *Bir Shumsher Jung Bahadur Rana (1885-1901) *Dev Shumsher Jung Bahadur Rana (1901) *Chandra Shumsher Jung Bahadur Rana (1901-1929) *Bhim Shumsher Jung Bahadur Rana (1929-1932) *Juddha Shumsher Jung Bahadur Rana (1932-1945) *Padma Shumsher Jung Bahadur Rana (1945-1948) *Mohan Shumsher Jung Bahadur Rana (1948-1951) *Matrika Prasad Koirala (1951-1955) *Surya Bahadur Thapa (1955) *Mahendra Bir Bikram Shah (1955-1956) *Tanka Prasad Acharya (1956-1957) *Kunwar Inderjit Singh (1957-1958) *Subarna Shamsher Rana (1958-1959) *Bishweshwar Prasad Koirala (1959-1960) *Mahendra Bir Bikram Shah (1960-1963) *Tulsi Giri (1963) *Surya Bahadur Thapa (1963-1964) *Tulsi Giri (1964-1965) *Surya Bahadur Thapa (1965-1969) *Kirti Nidhi Bista (1969-1970) *Gehendra Bahadur Rajbhandari (1970-1971) *Kirti Nidhi Bista (1971-1973) *Nagendra Prasad Rijal (1973-1975) *Tulsi Giri (1975-1977) *Kirti Nidhi Bista (1977-1979) *Surya Bahadur Thapa (1979-1983) *Lokendra Bahadur Chand (1983-1986) *Marich Man Singh Shrestha (1986-1990) *Lokendra Bahadur Chand (1990) *Krishna Prasad Bhattarai (1990-1991) *Girija Prasad Koirala (1991-1994) *Manmohan Adhikari (1994-1995) *Sher Bahadur Deuba (1995-1997) *Lokendra Bahadur Chand (1997) *Surya Bahadur Thapa (1997-1998) *Girija Prasad Koirala (1998-1999) *Krishna Prasad Bhattarai (1999-2000) *Girija Prasad Koirala (2000-2001) *Sher Bahadur Deuba (2001-2002) *Lokendra Bahadur Chand (2002-2003) *Surya Bahadur Thapa (2003-2004) *Sher Bahadur Deuba (2004-2005) *Girija Prasad Koirala (2006-2008) *Girija Prasad Koirala (2008) *Pushpa Kamal Dahal (2008-2009) *Madhav Kumar Nepal (2009-2011) *Jhala Nath Khanal (2011) *Baburam Bhattarai (2011-2013) *Khil Raj Regmi (2013-2014) *Sushil Koirala (2014-2015) *KP Sharma Oli (2015-2016) *Pushpa Kamal Dahal (2016-2017) *Sher Bahadur Deuba (2017-2018) *KP Sharma Oli (2018-2021) *Sher Bahadur Deuba (2021-2022) *Pushpa Kamal Dahal (2022-2024) *KP Sharma Oli (2024-present) Category:Prime ministers of Nepal Nepal Prime ministers
title: List of prime ministers of Nepal
